import math

n, x, t = map(int, input().split())

print(math.ceil(n / x) * t)
# coding: utf-8

import math

n,x,t = map(int,input().split())

print(math.ceil(n/x)*t)

n, x, t = map(int, input().split())

if n % x == 0:
    print(t * (n // x))
else:
    print(t * (n // x + 1))

import math

n,x,t = map(int,input().split())
if n % x == 0:
    print(math.ceil(n/x)*t)
else:
    print((n//x + 1)*t)
